name: Rejse
description:
Play as the fearless captain of a crew of Vikings on a journey to save your village. As with any good story you run into a few problems along the way, whether it be monsters or mother nature herself. Unfortunately nobody travels the sea without offerings to the gods of the sea, whether it be the gold you collect along the way... Or your own crew members. Run out of crew and the journey is over. Can you bring everyone back to the village safely?

Made for Ludum Dare 44, it's barely finished! Let me know about bugs.

Coding by me, art by Jaclyn, Collin, Cooper, and Toby, music by Jarrod and Toby.

Arrow keys move, 'X' selects.
